articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
DATA AVAILABILITY via @ethereum 
Data availability is the guarantee that the block proposer published all transaction data for a block and that the transaction data is available to other network participants. https://ethereum.org/nb/developers/docs/data-availability/

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Alchemy | The web3 developer platform
✏️ Build with Alchemy!
How do you get all the NFTs minted by a specific address?
No need to browse the entire blockchain!
Call Alchemy's getAssetTransfers() and let us do the work for you ⚡️
Try it out: https://alchemy.com/sdk
